about_the_game:
In Neo Gunma, the mega fast-food corporation, Wank Wanknald, has gained a stranglehold on the city and its people by driving out all other available competition. Inspector Jenny is on a murder case when she enlists the help of the private detective Suzuka to aid in her investigation, but things quickly take a turn for the worse when riots break out across the city due to a change in their menu, leaving many of the poorer citizens of the city unable to afford anything to eat anymore.

Explore the city to gather information, items, and supplies as you work your way up to the top and take down the corporation oppressing the city. You’ll need to be careful as you traverse the seedy underside of Neo Gunma as various lewd encounters lay in wait. And it’s not just the corporation’s goons that you’ll have to keep an eye out for! Neo Gunma is home to all sorts of lecherous fiends eyeing out Suzuka’s killer body, just waiting for the opportunity to strip her down and have their way with her!

Take part in classic turn-based RPG combat where you’ll need to not only bring brute force to the table, but prepare in advance and adapt on the fly if you hope to come out on top, lest Detective Suzuka finds her lips wrapped around some goon’s cock by the end of it.

Crafting

With Iori’s skills in tinkering and building, you will be able to craft various items to help you resolve the rather seedy encounters that are all too common in the backstreets of Neo Gunma.

Variety Of Characters And Events

Suzuka will find herself in many obscene circumstances, from being milked like a cow, to having her ass stretched and pounded in public, there are no shortages when it comes to the creative ways the goons of Neo Gunma will play with her!

And while Suzuka may face many lewd encounters throughout the game, she is far from alone! New Eromancer features a wide cast of girls, each with their own events and sexy encounters which unfold and are influenced by your choices throughout the story. Futas, public humiliation, and women in leather, there’s lots to look forward to!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, drug/alcohol abuse, and self-harm.

name: New Eromancer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fight, craft, and explore the streets as Detective Suzuka battles the corrupt Wank Wanknald. This lewd RPG combines strategic combat, spicy encounters, and a gripping story where your choices shape intense battles and the fates of a hot cast of characters.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
